summary: Provides a simulated implementation of the AWS Kinesis Video Archived Media service, including a mock backend that can generate DASH and HLS streaming session URLs and retrieve video fragments from archived streams, and a response wrapper that exposes the fragment data and generated URLs to callers.
business_intent: Allow developers to test and develop applications that interact with Kinesis Video Archived Media without requiring access to the real AWS service, facilitating offline testing, CI pipelines, and costâ€‘free integration.
